text:
@Yamiche Three months into the #coronavirus pandemic, his most "thoughtful" comment about the human toll. Clearly part of a push to "reinvent" Trump as a compassionate leader. Too late. Can't put lipstick on that pig.

P.S. ~ Deconstruction? Trump's writers need to be more conversational.
